info.name: Facebook Ultimate Simple and Clean
info.description:
This design will make you relax when you need some rest with facebook.

-Hide status friend and newfeed bar
-Hide ads 
-Hide something no need for your life -lol-
-Bigger chat and re-design like Messenger apps. 
-Fix some little things.
-Apply for Chrome and Firefox also
info.additionalInfo:
You can change background image with this "http://i.imgur.com/Ca912Gc.jpg". Search and replace it

Change color top-bar with "#blueBarHolder #blueBar, #blueBarNAXAnchor". Search that id and replace code background inside.
